titleStmt.title: The English part of the library of the late Duke of Lauderdale being a catalogue of choice English books in divinity, history, geography, law, poetry and miscellany, all curiously bound and gilt on the back, many in turkey leather, and of the large papers : which will be sold by auction at Sams Coffee-House in Ave-Mary-Lane near Ludgate-Street, on Tuesday, May 27, 1690, at three of the clock in the afternoon, and so to continue daily till all be sold.
titleStmt.author: Lauderdale, John Maitland, Duke of, 1616-1682.

notesStmt.note: "Catalogues are distributed gratis at Mr.Partridges ... Mr. Hensman's ... Mr. Wilkinson's ... Mr. Batemans's ... Mr.Swalle's ... Mr. Eddowes ... booksellers; as also at Mr. Hall's ... in Oxford; and Mr. Dawson's ... in Cambridge."
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Library.
